content:
“Is this the fastest route to the Golden Shore? I want to try to get some fishing in before dark! You haven’t changed your mind, have you?”

RANGERS CHOOSE

A) Agree to keep accompanying Ar Tel to Golden Shore. Discard all   from Ar Tel.

B) Send Ar Tel home. Discard Ar Tel and return HELPING HAND to your collection. Each Ranger soothes 1 fatigue.
